summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of Celer tile/card management system. All core features working correctly including tile creation, archival/restore, card management with multiple types, and settings panel functionality.

minor_issues.issue: 404 errors when loading CSV files from GitHub (expected behavior since files don't exist)
minor_issues.impact: Cards show but CSV data doesn't load
minor_issues.note: This is expected behavior as CSV files referenced don't exist in the test environment

passed_tests: Add Tile flow: Successfully created new tile 'Test System Design'
Archive Tile flow: Successfully archived tile with confirmation dialog
Restore Tile flow: Successfully restored archived tile via Manage Tiles modal
Add Card flow: Successfully added Flashcard card with CSV reference
AI Card modal: All required fields present (description, company, CV, job, context, system instruction, question set)
Company fetch button: Present and functional in AI card modal
Generate and Refine buttons: Present for AI system instruction generation
Settings panel: CSV Base URL input field present and functional
Settings panel: Manage Tiles button present and accessible
Default tiles: All existing tiles (Innovation Lab, Knowledge Base, Concept Drill, Mock Interview, Technical Quiz, Skill Development, Industry Terms) render correctly
Navigation: Header navigation and app title display correctly
Authentication: Proper authentication flow with code '2026'
Disclaimer modal: Proper disclaimer acknowledgment flow
Tile persistence: Custom tiles persist via localStorage
Card types: Support for AI, Flashcard, MCQ, TypeAnswer, and Link card types
Floating actions: Manage Tiles, Settings, and other action buttons work correctly
